text: Good, cheap fry up. Ordered the 2 eggs special with bacon and home fries and toast for $5. Eggs were cooked properly and the staff were super friendly. Their menu is pretty large and he place was packed. Everyone else also seemed to be happy with their food (taking Pi tires, etc.).
My kids love the poutine and I love the BLT. Owners are always cheerful and appreciate your business.

Its located inside the Stouffville country market food court.  This is a great place to get a quick bite on weekends when shopping at the market.  Breakfast items are cheap and plentiful. Service is friendly but takes a while at times. It does get quite busy on weekends during brunch hours
